name: CVE-2021-34781
description: A vulnerability in the processing of SSH connections for multi-instance deployments of Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) Software could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition on the affected device. This vulnerability is due to a lack of proper error handling when an SSH session fails to be established. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a high rate of crafted SSH connections to the instance. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to cause resource exhaustion, which causes a DoS condition on the affected device. The device must be manually reloaded to recover.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:7.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.4.0.13:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.7.0.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:6.7.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_management_center_virtual_appliance:7.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:firepower_threat_defense:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.4.0.13:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.7.0.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:cisco:sourcefire_defense_center:6.7.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
